title: This is not acceptable. Really?
body:
I used the R word once and got 14 day suspension. It was also once. I have never broken the code before. I used the r word in one game and got a 14 day suspension. Never had any warnings or anything prior. This post isn;t about that. This post is about how people can straight up int games and they never seem to get punished.
So our annie and tahm botlane took smite and proceeded to follow jg around taking his farm. Then in all chat they lied to the enemy that jg asked them. Left botlane open and for enemy bot to freefarm following jg for at least first 10 minutes of game stealing his farm with their smites.
Tahm would also use his devour to spit teammates into the enemy.
This is not acceptable is it?
Wasn't ranked but it's draft.

Post Game Chat Log:
Tarchia:  I have to ask. What was that
GriefingTahm:  aatrox fault
spillay:  ive been playing this game for years
GriefingTahm:  asked us to jg
Awoken DonnyBoy:  yikes
spillay:  this is the first time ive seen someone act so ******** and pathetic
Everyone on your team honored a teammate! You got a little extra Honor progress this game.
GriefingTahm:  u toxic tho
GriefingTahm:  we help u
GriefingTahm:  and u mad
GriefingTahm:  wow
goodiesohhi:  enjoy ur permaban
GriefingTahm:  reported
GriefingAnnie:  nice strat aatrox ty
JMarzi:  getting you all banned
GriefingTahm:  wp aatrox
GriefingAnnie:  eat cheat
goodiesohhi:  dont listen to them
Tarchia:  Tahm litirally spit you into me when you had no HP
Tarchia:  Troll?
GriefingTahm:  no
goodiesohhi:  theyve been folowing jg stealing his farm
JMarzi:  100% troll
GriefingTahm:  he clicked there
goodiesohhi:  claiming jg aske them
GriefingTahm:  to make me look like troll
Ghoulovich left the lobby
GriefingTahm:  i didnt die
GriefingTahm:  so i didnt troll
GriefingTahm:  aatrox wanted that meta
Lorri left the lobby
Tarchia left the lobby
spillay:  ur a very sad person tahm
GriefingTahm:  nice stats aatrox nice strats
Leaguerguy left the lobby
GriefingTahm:  ur mad
Awoken DonnyBoy left the lobby
GriefingTahm:  cuz ur strats didnt work
GriefingAnnie:  repport aarrox plz
GriefingTahm:  bad boy
GriefingTahm:  yes
GriefingTahm:  report aatrox
GriefingTahm left the lobby
GriefingAnnie left the lobby
spillay:  wowie
JMarzi left the lobby
goodiesohhi:  2 fresh reports
spillay left the lobby

replies.body: So both of you probably got punished instead of just the troll. GG.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ysmuvgE8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-01T02:38:53.993+0000)
>
> So both of you probably got punished instead of just the troll. GG.

This was basically the entire game.
Game starts. I'm in mid. Our jg is running around and our botlane is just tailing him trying to outsmite him. He's obviously blowing his lid in allchat. I would be too. Enemy's just free farming bot.
The below is just a sum of what was happening (not quotes)
Botlane in all chat: I don't think your 3 jg strats working aatrox.
Aatrox: profanities
Mundo: Pls report bot
Me: Pls Report
Botlane: I don;t think your 3 jg strats working aatrox.
Tahm: Whadya mean I'm trolling? You clicked to exit there I didn't spit you hurdur.
Botlane: More lies about how aatrox asked them to support him jg.
Aatrox: more profanities.
Me: Trying to explain to enemy all chat that our bot is just making s*** up.
Mundo: Pls report
What’s an R word.. the slangs in a country is like every city’s time zone on one clock.

> [{quoted}](name=PERIMITION,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ysmuvgE8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-01T02:51:57.074+0000)
>
> What’s an R word.. the slangs in a country is like every city’s time zone on one clock.

"Retard/retarded"
It was directed at a shyvana who helped herself to my wave everytime she walked from topside jg to botside jg.
Asked her to stop 3 times and she ignored me so I blew my lid the fourth time and flamed her. I also used the censored f word (as In I censored it) but whatever thats old news.

> [{quoted}](name=goodiesohhi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ysmuvgE8,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-01T02:54:41.331+0000)
>
> "Retard/retarded"
> It was directed at a shyvana who helped herself to my wave everytime she walked from topside jg to botside jg.
> Asked her to stop 3 times and she ignored me so I blew my lid the fourth time and flamed her. I also used the censored f word (as In I censored it) but whatever thats old news.

You know, you could just go and take a live chat with riot support, seriously, it works, I had a zyra support jhin gave first blood and She comes to midlane and takes 1/2 of my wave and Xp. But I controled myself and I think it’s safe to say that player might have learned the wrath of purposefully ruining the game.
